sentences.en: a sour-faced old man
sentences.cn: 绷着脸的老人

sentences.en: An unhappy childhood has soured her view of life.
sentences.cn: 不幸的童年扭曲了她的人生观。

sentences.en: Even the European dream is beginning to turn sour.
sentences.cn: 甚至连欧洲之梦都开始破灭了。

sentences.en: Everything turned sour for me there.
sentences.cn: 在那里，对我来说一切变得很不顺利。

sentences.en: Green apples are sour.
sentences.cn: 未熟的苹果是酸的.

sentences.en: How sour these grapes taste!
sentences.cn: 这些葡萄真酸!

sentences.en: Lemons have a sour taste.
sentences.cn: 柠檬有股酸味.

sentences.en: Most green fruit is sour.
sentences.cn: 大多数未熟的水果都是酸的.

sentences.en: Rachel sampled the wine. It was sour.
sentences.cn: 雷切尔尝了尝葡萄酒，是酸的。

sentences.en: She made a sour face in his direction.
sentences.cn: 她冲他阴沉着脸。

sentences.en: She really looks sour this morning.
sentences.cn: 她今天上午脾气的确有些坏.

sentences.en: Sour - sweet fish agreed very well with him.
sentences.cn: 糖醋鱼很合他的胃口.

sentences.en: sour cherries
sentences.cn: 酸樱桃

sentences.en: The barn was filled with the sour-sweet smell of fresh dung.
sentences.cn: 谷仓里弥漫着新粪酸甜的气味。

sentences.en: The fruit is still green and eats sour.
sentences.cn: 果子还青,吃起来很酸.

sentences.en: The milk smells sour.
sentences.cn: 牛奶闻起来酸了.

sentences.en: the vision of bedsit freedom soon turned sour.
sentences.cn: 这种把卧室和起居室并为一体可以自由自在的想法很快就变得不受欢迎了。

sentences.en: Their songs are filled with tales of love gone sour.
sentences.cn: 他们的歌里充斥着变了味的爱情故事。

sentences.en: This milk has gone sour.
sentences.cn: 这牛奶已变酸了.

sentences.en: Thomas made a little grimace, perhaps he thought the wine was sour.
sentences.cn: 托马斯微微皱起眉头可能是他认为酒发酸了.

words.tran_cn: 性情乖僻地；坏心眼地；酸酸地

phrases.tran_cn: 变得不愉快；失去吸引力；变得不受欢迎
不再受欢迎；出漏子；变酸
酸葡萄（形容妒忌而贬低自己得不到的东西）
酸葡萄心理（因为自己得不到就诋毁或蔑视某物）
[美国英语]使某人对…表示反感

trans.tran_cn: 有酸味的，敌对的，坏脾气的，别扭的
trans.tran_en: having a sharp acid taste, like the taste of a  lemon  or a fruit that is not ready to be eaten

trans.tran_cn: 变酸， 变馊； 变得乖戾
trans.tran_en: if milk sours, or if something sours it, it begins to have an unpleasant sharp taste

trans.tran_cn: 变酸，变馊，发酵，厌烦，败坏
变坏，恶化，使变酸，使失望，使不毛
